comment: Mari has been a wonderful professor.  She regularly drops math knowledge bombs in my ear hole thing

Pretty tough grader, even for a calculus professor. She's very knowledgeable, but  I honestly had a hard time keeping up with her lectures. It doesn't seem fair for instructors to make attendance mandatory if some of the students can't even keep up with them. Students who can't keep up can just get tutoring if they don't get the lectures, yes?

Dr. Castle tries to teach her students, but it takes quite a while to go over questions. This takes up most of class and we really don't get enough examples shown to do well on the test.  She occasionally takes up a few HW problems, but it is generally your option to do them. Want a good grade on her tests? DO THE HOMEWORK. Trust me they help.

Dr. Castle is not what you expect from a calculus teacher. She does swear sometimes in class and gets frustrated at the students, but she is pretty nice if you get to know her. Spends most of the time talking about proofs instead of working through problems. Expect to do most of your studying and learning on your own if you want a good grade.

This professor was one of the worst Ive ever had. She uses the most basic examples but puts the hardest possible questions on the test. Her lectures are very confusing. She knows a lot about calculus and makes you feel stupid if you don't. If you are an einstein at math, you won't have a problem but if not DONT TAKE HER CLASS.

She's okay. Moves very fast & doesn't answer questions much in class. NEED a good grasp on algebra and trig skills or else you're done for! Seems willing to help sometimes, but others she makes me feel dumb. Tests are hard but doable. MUST have textbook because we have daily homework from there which she collects to grade.

Prof. Castle is one of my favorite professors thus far. She has an amazing ability to present information and is extensively concerned for her students. I thoroughly enjoyed this course. I have learned an extensive amount of information and have profoundly increased my ability to do mathematics.

She NEVER uses d2l or posts grades which drove me crazy the whole semester! Also she goes over the material extremely fast so it is hard to keep up if you don't understand something because she rarely stops for discussion. Overall I would not recommend taking her!
Her notes are literally all over the place. Quizzes are every week and she works really fast. If you don't have a good foundation of algebra and precalculus, don't take her.

Gives very detailed notes. I never used the book. She gives 4 take-home assignments worth 60% of ur grade + midterm & final. Her assignments are difficult, but fair, & you can work in groups. She's not as mean as she seems - just ask for help *after* you've tried a problem. Shes a cool lady. Recommend.
Easy class... the undergrads whomped the graduates. Just study and do the presentations.

Dr. Castle is a wonderful professor. I was never good at math, but she was so helpful. The key to doing well in her class is doing all of your homework. All of her quiz problems come from the homework. Her tests are fair and she gives a lot of partial credit. I recommend her for Calculus !

Calculus is hard, but I felt like I was always struggling to learn the material in my own time in the math lab. She seems to teach more to those who are math majors and will take higher levels of calculus. 3 tests and a final. 12 quizzes(from hmwk) which will add up to 1 test grade. Tests were FAR more difficult than any of the homework problems.

If your an auditory learner, take her! If you'd prefer to see more examples and multiple ways to work a problem, keep searching. Notes consist of sentence after sentence, not very many examples. Used the book for homework but she doesnt grade it. Drops 2 lowest quizzes out of 12. 3 test and cumulative final. Never responded to my emails.
She makes calculus very easy to understand and will make sure you know your stuff! Very easy going professor.

mixed feelings about her. sometimes she's nice other times she makes the class feel stupid. homework is weighed heavily and theres plenty of room to mess up. attenance mandatory. in depth tests but gives bonus points. quick to respond to e-mails but doesnt really reply on vista. no cumulative final which is awesome.

Don't be fooled, she is still a difficult tester. She is very clear on explaining the material, and very willing to work with those who do not get it. But you have to study hard for her exams. She tests on difficult material to prove what you know. But i still recommend her. Loved her as a teacher

Dr. Castle is great. She teaches at a fast pace, but I wouldn't expect any different for a summer class. Plenty of examples and the material is explained well. She's always willing to help and answer questions. Quizzes are easy and tests are fair. Nothing ridiculous. Go to class, take good notes, do the HW, and you'll get the grade you deserve.

I almost always feel like math is a foreign language to me, but Castle explained everything very clear and thorough and I never felt lost or left behind for a moment in her class. It is definitely the best math class I've ever had, take her if you struggle with math because she goes into great detail and helps to understand.

Castle was ridiculously hard. Would not suggest her. While she knows everything there is to know about Calculus it is hard for her to explain it to her students. Your grade consits of only 3 tests each worth about 30 percent of your grade and weekly quizzes. Not reccommended...I got my first C...EVER!
Wonderful professor. I know that I will never have a math professor as good as her.

1 quiz a week, questions are straight from homework, but even if you don't do it she goes over it at the beginning of class so you can learn it right before the quiz. Exams are very clear and easy, she won't try to trick you. Extremely willing to help, so much so she showed up to one of our exam reviews. Very good professor all around.

Quiz every week, several are dropped, they are problems straight from the HW which comes completely from the book so you need the book.  I thought she was great, examples on the board for every concept she taught and the examples were extensive.  Recommended.

I was a little scared when I took this class, but it turned out not that bad. This class is hard, so do your work and study hard. Dr.Castle is nice professor, I like her. She is very clear on what she want from you.

Attendance isn't mandatory, but you won't make an A if you're not there. The class is really heavy on notes, but not much homework. She takes up a few hw assignments, but gives you a few days notice. She won't baby her students, and she knows her stuff. Great professor.
